definition: non-Han people, esp. from central Asia/reckless/outrageous/what?/why?/to complete a winning hand at mahjong (also written 和[hu2])
generic name for hemp, flax etc/hemp or flax fiber for textile materials/sesame/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/(of materials) rough or coarse/pocked/pitted/to have pins and needles or tingling/to feel numb

sentences.english: Living on selling benne, he led a hard and poor life.
sentences.chinese: 他靠卖胡麻为生，日子过得很清苦。

sentences.english: The oil squeezed out from the til is very sweet-smelling, and of high edible value.
sentences.chinese: 这种胡麻榨出的油很香，具有很高的食用价值。

sentences.english: Many nutrition health protection functional compositions are involved in the flaxseed.
sentences.chinese: 胡麻籽中含有诸多的营养保健功能成分。

sentences.english: Thus the adaptive fields of flax under the mulch with plastic film were the areas of high and cold.
sentences.chinese: 因此认为地膜胡麻的适应区域是高山冷凉山区。

sentences.english: The extension of this cultivation technical pack-age has greatly boosted the development of local flax production.
sentences.chinese: 该项技术的推广，促进了当地胡麻生产的发展。

sentences.english: The paper studied the dyeing performance of oil-flax on the foundation of flax fibers modification.
sentences.chinese: 文章对胡麻改性前后上染率进行了研究。

sentences.english: I keep a-lifting 'til the end of the day.
sentences.chinese: 我把一个带毒的胡麻一天结束。

sentences.english: Oil_used flax is a kind of fine material of textile industry.
sentences.chinese: 胡麻是一种优良的纺织原料。

sentences.english: Hu is the use of indigenous or sesame oil produced from oil press .
sentences.chinese: 胡麻油就是采用土法或榨油机生产出的食用油。

sentences.english: The genus Trapella Oliv. and T. sinensis Oliv. are new records from Guangdong;
sentences.chinese: 胡麻科的茶菱属和茶菱均为广东新记录。

definition: a smaller variety of watermelon, with big, edible seeds
